profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.3 Output intent - Valid ICC output profile
profile.description: The profile stream that is the value of the DestOutputProfile key shall either be an output profile (Device Class = "prtr") or a monitor profile (Device Class = "mntr"). The profiles shall have a colour space of either "GRAY", "RGB", or "CMYK".
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: The profile stream that is the value of the DestOutputProfile key shall either be an output profile (Device Class = "prtr") or a monitor profile (Device Class = "mntr"). The profiles shall have a colour space of either "GRAY", "RGB", or "CMYK".

error.message: The embedded PDF/A Output Intent colour profile has invalid header
